review: I am LOVING this!!! So much fun to watch shows and movies I would not otherwise. Love having Netflix and Hulu available to me at the touch of a button. The stick is so small and it is great to be able to take it with me to my moms or when visiting friends or babysitting. My most favorite purchase from Amazon in years!!!
author: Leah Harvey

review: Great product.  Love the way navigation is set up, super easy to use.

review: I wanted to love this, but it was too buggy and would constantly crash or freeze. I would not recommend this to a friend, but would recommend Chromecast or Roku.
author: Brian C

review: We have two of these and they are awesome!  It's so nice to not have to use our PS4 or PS3 in order to watch Prime, Netflix, etc.  There are even games you can play.  It's perfect.

review: Great picture, can mirror my phone. Get Netflix and have my HBO.
